item.title: Blessed are you, Human
item.dc:creator: Vasan
item.description:
I asked God, “How does it feel to walk on water Author, founder, all-knowing father?” “Meh”, he reacted; dejected by his answer, I asked, “Why, O holy creator of matter?” “Er Mat, you can swim and scale the sea You can delude the feeling of being free Flee and pursue the heights of curiosity See …

Blessed are you, Human Read More »

The post Blessed are you, Human appeared first on Aberrance.
item.content:encoded:
I asked God,

“How does it feel to walk on water

Author, founder, all-knowing father?”

“Meh”, he reacted; dejected by his answer,

I asked, “Why, O holy creator of matter?”

“Er Mat, you can swim and scale the sea

You can delude the feeling of being free

Flee and pursue the heights of curiosity

See where you wanna be and in time be

Live and believe in the mystery of love

Flow and fare with the dolphin and dove

Off into the unknown sea and skies above

A world of wonders, you’ve always dreamt of

With limited time and lots of seconds to spare

Moments to create and memories to share

Mat, you are everything I want to be and care

Every time you swim, I find it to be fun and rare.”

Here, God tells Matthew, how it sucks to be all OMNIPRESENT, OMNIPOTENT AND OMNISCIENT. The divine dilemma.

And he reminds him how and why it’s a blessing to be human.

Vasan

We all are aberrant from the ways of this world in one way or another | Sub-Editor at Smartprix.com

The post Blessed are you, Human appeared first on Aberrance.

item.title: Man in the Making
item.dc:creator: Vasan
item.description:
Shawty, it’s about a man in the making And a life that’s out there for his taking Chasing a story with gold and glory Holes and holy well to be less lonely Hoary, for he felt sorry for being whorey Fine me if you find these lines phony Honey, if you relate, great it’ll be …

Man in the Making Read More »

The post Man in the Making appeared first on Aberrance.
item.content:encoded:
Shawty, it’s about a man in the making
And a life that’s out there for his taking
Chasing a story with gold and glory
Holes and holy well to be less lonely
Hoary, for he felt sorry for being whorey
Fine me if you find these lines phony
Honey, if you relate, great it’ll be thorny
Or else spineless whine of a cornless corny

Wrote what I caught as my thoughts fought
Wrought a lot, still, dot dot… dotless drought
Naught nada nothing to note, nothing to gloat
Gotta plot a lot to find just one spot for this GOAT
Hot red-hot ramen in my head, stop I’m fuckin’ fed
Up with meeting my ends which ends up dead
Heads up I’d rather be dead now than be another
Subpar greyhead in deathbed weeping for the reaper

I admit I was in a vacuum within my darkroom
Trying to seat my feet in others’ shoes’ no excuse
And as I chose to cage my insecurities in a closet
I was lost, locked in n’ left with a loose neck noose
But rose-tinted memories were all a lost cause needs
At times when grasping at straws and flimsy reeds
Held me together under the rain n’ thunder’s reign
Trusting the seeds I’d sown both in words n’ deeds

Hey mister the world’s bloody sinister n’ Imma sinner
Err is to be me human who killed his way to the heaven
I’m no angel nor lucifer crucified for the deadly seven
But off the seven point seven billion, am I even a good one?
Hmm hum this might sound like umm rant dumb
Ho hum voice of people in drains, dregs n’ dump
Numb as they come from beyond the flattering filters
Glitter n’ glam, where hustle’s real, fun n’ joy the fillers

So pull back n’ peek a panic attack of a big blown crack
Quack croak cry of a hunchback, out of his whack
With a throat lump bigger than a boulder on his back
Weighing on a heart that’s chronically homesick
Click-clack boom thoughts like 9mm headshots fired
And tired connecting dots shattered yet silly inspired
By a few indistinct and distant dreams and desires
Reaching ’em is my sole resolve until this Life retires

Now I’m waving goodbye to a past that passed by
And the feet drift to a road less traveled by
Although the eyes find them seemingly strayed
But my heart says, “Leave it, let the way decide”
So, this is a story of a man’s legacy in the making
And about a life that’s out there for his taking
See if you relate, great it’ll be a complex melody
Else willy-nilly, it’ll come out as a confused medley

Vasan

We all are aberrant from the ways of this world in one way or another | Sub-Editor at Smartprix.com

The post Man in the Making appeared first on Aberrance.

item.title: An Endlessly Exciting Girl
item.dc:creator: Vasan
item.description:
To express endlessly exciting Dear words, he is inviting You to land in rhyming To etch a beauty in writing I have held time by its throat You have the liberty you sought Have a taste of my thoughts Free my feelings laced in love knots Ahead, thus the words marched headstrong To the home …

An Endlessly Exciting Girl Read More »

The post An Endlessly Exciting Girl appeared first on Aberrance.
item.content:encoded:
To express endlessly exciting
Dear words, he is inviting
You to land in rhyming
To etch a beauty in writing

I have held time by its throat
You have the liberty you sought
Have a taste of my thoughts
Free my feelings laced in love knots

Ahead, thus the words marched headstrong
To the home of my heart, they trailed along

Then they tried to stir the blur to confer
What I prefer, what do I like about her?

I first echoed my favorite reply “I.D.K.”
Then I said, if I may, if I had my way, I would say

She is tempting like the hook of a song
Where melody and rhythm muse to belong

Her smile, breathtaking as the seamless skies
It feels like a bliss that sailed across several lives

Her lips, soft and tender like red rose petals
A kiss would feel like when the sun meets the sea and settles

If you’re close do gaze at her browny eyes
You would see the space where a riddled star lies

A look of her simply slices my heart a little
Crumbling my crimson heart, soft and brittle

Her hair falls on the elegant curves of her neck
Via the valleys behind the seashell ears onto a speck

Yes a speck like the dark spot of the moon
With a glow which would swoon in my rune

If only I had it my way, I will endlessly draw the “Endlessly Exciting Girl” with such distorted details. But words always vaporize and my memory isn’t loyal. I believe my words won’t fail me this time and I would immortalize a mortal forever in my words.

Thus, letters are landing and words are whipping into shape something special, something endlessly exciting.

Vasan

We all are aberrant from the ways of this world in one way or another | Sub-Editor at Smartprix.com

The post An Endlessly Exciting Girl appeared first on Aberrance.

item.title: A soft kiss of rain
item.dc:creator: Vasan
item.description:
Like the first drop from heaven, you fell You softly caressed and I fell in your spell In a jiff, a whiff, a wind, I came into sense It felt like that moment mattered in all my tense I let the world move ahead and simply stood Soaked, drenched and all my worries dripped Ether …

A soft kiss of rain Read More »

The post A soft kiss of rain appeared first on Aberrance.
item.content:encoded:
Like the first drop from heaven, you fell
You softly caressed and I fell in your spell

In a jiff, a whiff, a wind, I came into sense
It felt like that moment mattered in all my tense

I let the world move ahead and simply stood
Soaked, drenched and all my worries dripped

Ether showered upon me and I was wet again
A cool dew drizzled down my brain and vein

It all felt blissful like every pure feeling should
Would’ve locked up time in our bubble if I could

Yes, like the first drop from heaven, you fell
You softly caressed and I simply fell in your spell

Vasan

We all are aberrant from the ways of this world in one way or another | Sub-Editor at Smartprix.com

The post A soft kiss of rain appeared first on Aberrance.

item.title: A Walk To Remember
item.dc:creator: Vasan
item.description:
An evening in the predestined sim It was moments of just you and him On that road to the horizon Where the clouds kissed the sun He saw you gazing the skies in a stream It all felt like losing in a surreal dream You spoke he heard, the only voice he heard While his …

A Walk To Remember Read More »

The post A Walk To Remember appeared first on Aberrance.
item.content:encoded:
An evening in the predestined sim
It was moments of just you and him

On that road to the horizon
Where the clouds kissed the sun

He saw you gazing the skies in a stream
It all felt like losing in a surreal dream

You spoke he heard, the only voice he heard
While his silence whispered word by word

And somehow in that sunny summer
Deep within his red ember
You felt like a cool December
Like a silly yet sweet September

It was a walk to remember
For him, a walk that goes forever

It was a walk to remember
For you, a walk that goes forever

Vasan

We all are aberrant from the ways of this world in one way or another | Sub-Editor at Smartprix.com

The post A Walk To Remember appeared first on Aberrance.

item.title: I wanna
item.dc:creator: Vasan
item.description:
I wanna wake up to a bright blue sky As my eyes say hi to the sun up high I wanna start with the smell of tea As my eyes soak in the horizon of the sea I wanna take shower under the waterfall As I jump from the top like a cannonball I wanna …

I wanna Read More »

The post I wanna appeared first on Aberrance.
item.content:encoded:
I wanna wake up to a bright blue sky
As my eyes say hi to the sun up high

I wanna start with the smell of tea
As my eyes soak in the horizon of the sea

I wanna take shower under the waterfall
As I jump from the top like a cannonball

I wanna lie under a tree on a lush meadow
While gazing at the shape-shifting clouds above

I wanna walk barefoot on the tingly grass
As a gentle evening breeze hugs and pass

I wanna sleep under a sky of stars and fireflies
As it’s her(moon) I see before I rest my eyes

I wanna feel love a million times again
As long as this life flows through my vein

I live for the different shades of the green, to belong next to the solitude of a dry tree, to be kissed by the sun
greener trees, clearer skies, earthly scent after a rain, the neon lights and the moondust in the darkest nights.

I want to touch the northern lights and go places where nature is a virgin, have a family of pups, learn violin or piano and go to space. A weird bucket list indeed.

Vasan

We all are aberrant from the ways of this world in one way or another | Sub-Editor at Smartprix.com

The post I wanna appeared first on Aberrance.
